Posts.Title: Sharp needle like pain in left breast and rash MGT44 carolv
Sharp needle like pain in left breast and rash MGT44 carolv

Posts.Content: MGT44 wrote: Hi I have had an eczema like rash on my left breast for over a year now. It started just outside the areola area but recently moved into the areola area. Some days it looks more 'angry' than others. I was seen by a breast care doctor when it first appeared and a mammogram was done but nothing untoward appeared on the mammogram. I think the exact wording was 'no significant changes to the breast'. Anyway, I am now experiencing a lot of pain in that breast. It feels like a stabbing needle like sensation. The area where the 'eczema' is, is painful to touch and again it feels very sharp, although I get the same pain intermittently without it being touched. I cannot lie face down as this also produces 'stabbing' sensations in my left breast. My left breast also appears swollen around the rash area although I tend to notice this more in the evening, if that makes sense. The reason I am posting this is because obviously it would make sense to go back to the doctor and have it checked out again but I suffer from agoraphobia and it isn't easy for me to go for hospital/doctor visits. I am hoping that someone out there who has possibly experienced the same symptoms can let me know whether this is just something innocent like 'hormonal' or really does deserve a visit to the doctors. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Sharp needle like pain in left breast and rash MGT44 carolv
